channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 09:30 Threat of shelling! Now in Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community artillery shelling. Put in shelter!
item.description: 🔴 09:30 Threat of shelling! Now in Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community artillery shelling. Put in shelter! This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
